name: memoize-fs
description: Node.js solution for memoizing/caching a function and its return state into the file system
author: Boris Diakur <contact@borisdiakur.com> (https://github.com/borisdiakur)

scripts.istanbul: rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report html && open coverage/memoize-fs/index.js.html
scripts.coveralls: rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
